critique: The document focuses on securing the supply chain for essential medicines and medical countermeasures. The primary emotions the President likely wants to elicit are joy (through increased security and availability of medicines), and reduced fear (by mitigating the risk of shortages and dependence on foreign suppliers). There might also be an element of surprise at the extent of the actions being taken to address these vulnerabilities. There could be some sadness about the current state of dependence and vulnerabilities, and some disgust at the trafficking of counterfeit medicines. There is little to suggest anger.
